name: as
signature: { <Out2>(out: Out2): <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out2, In, R>; <Out, In, R, Out2>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, out: Out2): Schedule<Out2, In, R>; }
description:
Transforms a schedule to always produce a constant output.
*Details This function modifies a given schedule so that instead of returning its
computed outputs, it always returns a constant value. This is useful when you need a schedule for timing but don’t care about its
actual output, or when you want to standardize results across different
scheduling strategies.
documentation:
Transforms a schedule to always produce a constant output.
*Details**

This function modifies a given schedule so that instead of returning its
computed outputs, it always returns a constant value.

This is useful when you need a schedule for timing but don’t care about its
actual output, or when you want to standardize results across different
scheduling strategies.
